alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Queen Anne's; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 2:51PM EDT until July 25 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sussex County in southern Delaware... Southwestern Kent County in central Delaware... Northeastern Talbot County in eastern Maryland... Southeastern Queen Anne`s County in northeastern Maryland... Caroline County in eastern Maryland... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 250 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sudlersville to near Greensboro to Easton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Dover, Easton, Denton, Harrington, Camden, Greensboro, Oakland, Ridgely, Church Hill, Goldsboro, Queen Anne, Woodside, Viola, Hartly, Smithville, Rising Sun-Lebanon, Jumptown, Hazlettville, Dover Speedway and Sandtown. People at the Delaware State Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
